body_html: @gchanan My usecase is a batch of covariance matrices to which I'd like to add epsilon times diagonal for regularization. Then when batched potrf, trtrs and others are implemented (#7500), this would become nice for some simple multivariate normal likelihood computations
body_text: @gchanan My usecase is a batch of covariance matrices to which I'd like to add epsilon times diagonal for regularization. Then when batched potrf, trtrs and others are implemented (#7500), this would become nice for some simple multivariate normal likelihood computations
body: @gchanan My usecase is a batch of covariance matrices to which I'd like to add epsilon times diagonal for regularization. Then when batched `potrf`, `trtrs` and others are implemented (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7500), this would become nice for some simple multivariate normal likelihood computations
